title: She Bought the House Her Mother Cleaned for 43 Years
description: Nichol Naranjo says she was destined to own the house that was a refuge, “a place to come and catch our breath. And to dream.”
dc:creator: Steven Kurutz

media:content.media:credit: John Burcham for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Margaret Gaxiola, left, was once the housekeeper of the home that her daughter Nichol Naranjo, right, bought in 2020.
